extendedInfo.description: Hockey Nations: Shoot-out is the free version of our full 3D hockey sim Hockey Nations 2010.Take part in a fun shoot-out game where you are one-on-one with the net-minder. Can you keep your nerve and score more goals than your opponent?Contains a 4 stage tournament mode where you compete to win a gold medal.

reviews.title: Coolest game on Earth!
reviews.comment: This a really fun game and not a single glitch on my Moment. Graphics are ok, reminds me of and old EA NHL game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I don\'t really like this game
reviews.comment: The reason I don\'t like this game is because I\'m a hockey player myself and they make it easier than it looks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better on iPhone/iPod
reviews.comment: Had this game the full paid for version aswell on my iPod touch and loved it but this is slow and the control is up in the left hand corner, taking away all playability, will not be purchasing full version till this is fixed. On my Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: really fantastic controls and graphics. Awesome for a free version. Great design and sweet cuz its hockey.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game, in theory. It does not run smoothly on the Motorola droid or the HTC Eris because their touch screens suck something awful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Nice game easy to play looks great but every players are right handed . Btw nice game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Terrible got the new Droid update and just freezes forever on the loading screen had to take the battery out to fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: They lowered the 2010 version to $2 from $5
reviews.comment: But on iOS I bought the new one for a dollar. Steve Jobs vision of affordable gaming and music holds as the new Google PLAY and I own a Galaxy Nexus and pre ordered a 7\" Nexus tablet and have 3 HTC phones and 6 Motorola phones so I am not a fanboy. I tell it as I see it and games are more on Play than the App Store compared to the market before Play. Not developers fault they were encouraged to sell it for $5. Probably fragmentation the reason too many phones to conform to.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: On the app store this game is great but until google introduce multitouch and talks to big developers android market will always be in 2nd pl@ce
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Easy, a little slow, d-pad in the game should be on bottom-left! D-pad on my phone doesn\'t move correctly like the one in-game. Great graphics. 4*s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its pretty good. Looks good. I have no idea y there is a pass button on a shootout lol and the goalies just stand there
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It has potential to be a great hockey game. I think its the only one out for droid so hockey fans will have to settle for now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good game, but u need 2 b able 2control the goalie, cause stopn the goal is hit or miss. I wanna poke check or come out Just give control of the Goale
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I think that this is cool but i wish u had more players not just 1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but needs some work
reviews.comment: Love this game play it all the time! but, u cannot deke and your golie cannot make saves.your only hope is the other player fires it wide. There is also no refs. The ither players often hit the post pick up the rebound and score. I also once did 3 laps around the rink came back and scored the game winner. Great game otherwise though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun but hard mode is near impossible to block a shot. Not enough time in hard mode to react and the the touch sensor is spotty and laggy. Moto Droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good idea, but Players didn\'t show up on screen. Just a white patch. Htc wild fire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great graphics and animation that is smooth(n1 ). Problem is the controls are terrible. The dpad code is really jacked up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of the best controls I have seen on a touchscreen!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice game but can\'t call it Hockey Nations without including Asian teams like Pakistan guys. Needs a little work on gameplay and app2sd support.
reviews.author: A Google User
